title: My shop and start screen are not showing
body:
So whenever i open league my start screen is just black with the loading icon, then when i click on the shop all i get is a black screen. Then when i press play that screen glitches out too and i cant see any of the options for things to play. 

BTW: Im using a mac, just FYI

replies.body: The black screen may indicate that your network can't connect to the client properly and download assets.  I suggest gong through each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a resolution here.  Be sure to select Mac for instructions on your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I have tried most of the things on that list and none of them have worked. Would you suggest that I update to OSX 11?

It's important to go through every step to rule out every possibility and make sure that everything is set up accurately.  If you're still having issues after, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will look into this with you and get this fixed up.  We'll reply asap!!
